SEARCH
Package org.redlich.jwtbridge

Annotation Interface JwtAuthenticationMechanismDefinition

@Target({TYPE,METHOD}) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface JwtAuthenticationMechanismDefinition
Annotation used to define a JSON Web Token (JWT) authentication mechanism. JWT authentication mechanism can verify JWT bearer access tokens which are sent with HTTP Authorization or other headers.
Author:
mpredli01

    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description

    issuer

    Required if the header() property is set to "Cookie".

  • Element Details

    • publicKey

      String publicKey
      Required, unless publicKeyLocation() is specified.
      Returns:
      Base64 or Base64URL encoded public verification key in PEM, JSON Web Key (JWK) or JSON Web Key Set (JWKS) format.
      Default:
      ""

    • publicKeyLocation

      String publicKeyLocation
      Required, unless publicKey() is specified.
      Returns:
      Location of the public verification key in PEM, JSON Web Key (JWK) or JSON Web Key Set (JWKS) format. The key can be located on the file system, classpath or at the remote HTTP(S) endpoint.
      Default:
      ""

    • publicKeyAlgorithm

      String[] publicKeyAlgorithm
      Required, with the "RS256" algorithm used by default.
      Returns:
      Public key algorithms that can be used to verify the token signature. "RS256" or "ES256" algorithms must be supported.
      Default:
      {"RS256"}

    • decryptKeyLocation

      String decryptKeyLocation
      Required if the inner-signed JWT tokens must be decrypted.
      Returns:
      Location of the private or secret decryption key.
      Default:
      ""

    • decryptKeyAlgorithm

      String[] decryptKeyAlgorithm
      Required if the inner-signed JWT tokens must be decrypted, with the "RSA-OAEP-256" algorithm used by default.
      Returns:
      decryption key algorithms that can be used to decrypt the token. "RSA-OAEP-256" or "RSA-OAEP" algorithms must be supported.
      Default:
      {"RSA-OAEP-256"}

    • issuer

      String issuer
      Required.
      Returns:
      Token issuer

    • audiences

      String[] audiences
      Recommended.
      Returns:
      Token audiences
      Default:
      {}

    • header

      String header
      Required.
      Returns:
      Name of the HTTP header which is used to pass JWT tokens. The defaut HTTP header name is "Authorization". If an HTTP header name is "Authorization" then its "Bearer" authorization scheme must be used to pass JWT tokens.
      Default:
      "Authorization"

    • cookieName

      String cookieName
      Required if the header() property is set to "Cookie". The default cookie name is "Bearer".
      Returns:
      Name of the cookie whose value is a JWT token.
      Default:
      "Bearer"

    • tokenAge

      long tokenAge
      Recommended.
      Returns:
      Token age. It is undefined if it is set to -1 which is a default value.
      Default:
      -1L

    • clockSkew

      long clockSkew
      Recommended when minor clock skews, typically up to 60 seconds, should be taken into consideration during the token expiration check.
      Returns:
      Clock skew. It is undefined if it is set to -1 which is a default value.
      Default:
      -1L
